content: Sift the dry ingredients together. The dry ingredients are the flour, cocoa powder, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Place all the dry ingredients in a sifter and shake it back and forth over a bowl to eliminate the clumps. Stir in the liquid ingredients and mix well. These are the eggs, vegetable oil, sour cream, and vanilla extract. Some people like to add these ingredients individually, but others stir them together in a second bowl and before adding them to the dry ingredients. Grease and flour an 8 inch round pan. Slowly pour the cake batter in. Make sure to get every bit of the batter into the pan. Bake at 350 °F (177 °C) for 30 minutes . Let the cake cool for five minutes. Wait until the cake is completely cool. Then you may frost or decorate as desired. Enjoy! Prepare to make the cake. Preheat the oven to 325° Fahrenheit or 162° Celsius. Grease and flour two 9-inch round baking pans. Mix the dry ingredients. In a large bowl, combine the flour, salt, baking powder, baking soda, cocoa powder, and sugar. Mix until the dry ingredients are properly folded in. Add the coffee, oil, and buttermilk. Pour in the hot coffee, canola oil, and buttermilk into the dry ingredients. Mix using a whisk or hand blender, until the ingredients resemble a light brown cake batter. Add the eggs and vanilla. Crack in the eggs and pour in the vanilla extract into the cake batter. Mix one last time until there are no more flour streaks and the chocolate cake batter is slightly thick. Pour batter into the cake pans. Using a rubber spatula, scrape the cake batter into both of the cake pans. Remove any leftover batter by scraping the edges of the bowl. Bake the cake. Place both cake pans in the oven to bake. Have the cake bake for about an hour, until the cake rises and is fluffy. Check to see if the cake is ready by sticking a small knife in the middle. If it comes out clean, it is fully baked. Let the cake cool. Remove both pans from the oven and have the cakes cool on a wire rack for about ten minutes. Leave them until they are cool enough to touch. Frost and decorate. Consider stacking both cakes to make a two-layer chocolate cake. Frost with chocolate buttercream frosting and/or decorate with any desired toppings such as berries, powdered sugar, coconut flakes, and sprinkles Serve and enjoy! Slice the chocolate cake and serve on a serving plate. Enjoy! Prepare to make the cake. Preheat oven to 350° degrees Fahrenheit or 176° Celsius. Grease and flour a 9x13-inch cake pan. Sift the dry ingredients except the sugar. In a large bowl, sift the flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, and baking soda with a whisk. Mix until properly combined. Add the sugar. Carefully pour in the sugar into the dry ingredients. Mix again with the whisk until the sugar combines in with the dry ingredients. Fold in the wet ingredients. Pour in the vegetable oil, water, and vanilla extract into the dry ingredients. Stir with a whisk or a hand blender until the cake batter forms and there are no more flour streaks. Pour the batter into the pan. Using a rubber spatula, scrape the cake batter into both of the cake pans. Remove any leftover batter by scraping the edges of the bowl. Bake the cake. Place the cake pan in the oven to bake. Have the cake bake for about an hour, until the cake rises and is fluffy. Let the cake cool. Remove the pan from the oven and have the cake cool on a wire rack for about ten minutes. Leave the cake until it is cool enough to touch. Frost and decorate. Frost with chocolate chocolate buttercream frosting and/or decorate with any desired toppings such as berries, powdered sugar, coconut flakes, and sprinkles. Serve and enjoy! Slice the chocolate cake and serve on a serving plate. Enjoy! Prepare to make the cake. Preheat oven to 350° degrees Fahrenheit or 176° Celsius. Grease and flour two 9-inch cake pans. Combine the dry ingredients. In a large bowl, mix the flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, baking powder, and salt. Mix the ingredients with a whisk and then form a well in the middle of the bowl. Add the wet ingredients. Pour in the soy or almond milk, vinegar, eggs, brewed coffee, and dairy-free sour cream into the well. Use a blender to mix for about two minutes until the cake batter forms and there are no more flour streaks. Pour batter into cake pans. Using a rubber spatula, scrape the cake batter into both of the cake pans. Remove any leftover batter by scraping the edges of the bowl. Bake the cake. Place both cake pans in the oven to bake. Have the cake bake for about 30-40 minutes, until the cake rises and is fluffy. Let the cake cool. Remove both pans from the oven and have the cakes cool for about twenty minutes on a wire rack. Leave both cakes until they are cool enough to touch. Frost and decorate. Consider stacking both cakes to make a two-layer chocolate cake. Frost with chocolate buttercream frosting and/or decorate with any desired toppings such as berries, powdered sugar, coconut flakes, and sprinkles Serve and enjoy! Slice the chocolate cake and serve on a serving plate. Enjoy! Prepare to make the cake. Preheat oven to 350° degrees Fahrenheit or 176° Celsius. Grease and flour a 9-inch square pan. Combine the dry ingredients. In a large bowl, mix the gluten-free flour, cocoa powder, sugar, salt, and xanthan gum. Stir with a whisk until well-combined. Add the wet ingredients. Pour in the cooking oil, vinegar, vanilla extract, water, and egg. Mix well with the whisk or use a hand-mixer and blend until the cake batter forms and there are no more flour streaks. Pour the batter into the pan. Using a rubber spatula, scrape the cake batter into both of the cake pans. Remove any leftover batter by scraping the edges of the bowl. Bake the cake. Place the cake pan in the oven to bake. Have the cake bake for about 30-35 minutes, until the cake rises and is fluffy. Let the cake cool. Remove the pan from the oven and have the cake cool on a wire rack for about ten minutes. Leave the cake until it is cool enough to touch. Frost and decorate. Frost with chocolate buttercream frosting and/or decorate with any desired toppings such as berries, powdered sugar, coconut flakes, and sprinkles. Serve and enjoy! Slice the chocolate cake and serve on a serving plate. Enjoy! Prepare to make the cake. Preheat oven to 350° degrees Fahrenheit or 176° Celsius. Grease and flour a 9x5-inch loaf pan. Combine the dry ingredients. In a large bowl, combine the flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt. Mix using a whisk until the dry ingredients are well-combined. Add the wet ingredients. Pour in the vegetable oil, vanilla extract, white vinegar, and water. Stir using a whisk or blend using a hand blender, until the cake batter forms and there are no more flour streaks. Pour batter into cake pans. Using a rubber spatula, scrape the cake batter into both of the cake pans. Remove any leftover batter by scraping the edges of the bowl. Bake the cake. Place both cake pans in the oven to bake. Have the cake bake for about 45 minutes, until the cake rises and is fluffy. Let the cake cool. Remove both pans from the oven and have the cakes cool for about twenty minutes on a wire rack. Leave both cakes until they are cool enough to touch. Frost and decorate. Consider stacking both cakes to make a two-layer chocolate cake. Frost with chocolate buttercream frosting and/or decorate with any desired toppings such as berries, powdered sugar, coconut flakes, and sprinkles Serve and enjoy! Slice the chocolate cake and serve on a serving plate. Enjoy!

<p>Who doesn’t love a chocolate cake? This delicious treat is perfect for everything from a weekday dessert to a special occasion, and making your own is easy! You can start with a basic chocolate cake or try out some variations to suit your dietary needs.</p>

<h3>
<div class="altblock"></div>

</h3>

</li>
<li><input class="css-checkbox" id="item_b32a4fd12d4dbd0208d4a3b7b719ff97" type="checkbox"/><label class="css-checkbox-label" for="item_b32a4fd12d4dbd0208d4a3b7b719ff97" name="item_b32a4fd12d4dbd0208d4a3b7b719ff97_lbl"></label><div class="checkbox-text">1 teaspoon baking soda</div>
</li>
<li><input class="css-checkbox" id="item_136187fd3d58ed6071ebf63df90877e9" type="checkbox"/><label class="css-checkbox-label" for="item_136187fd3d58ed6071ebf63df90877e9" name="item_136187fd3d58ed6071ebf63df90877e9_lbl"></label><div class="checkbox-text">1 teaspoon salt</div>
</li>

</li>

</li>

</li>

<h2 class="hidden"><span class="mw-headline" id="Steps">Steps</span></h2>
<a class="anchor" name="Basic_Chocolate_Cake_2_sub"></a><div class="section steps sticky steps_first">
<h3>
<div class="altblock"><label class="method_label">Method</label> <span>1</span>
</div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="Basic_Chocolate_Cake_2">Basic Chocolate Cake</span>
</h3>
<div class="section_text" id="steps_1">
<ol class="steps_list_2">
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-1-Version-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-1-Version-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 1" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/9b/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-1-Version-2.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-1-Version-2.jpg" height="485" id="img_47892ce013" onload="WH.performance.clearMarks('image1_rendered'); WH.performance.mark('image1_rendered');" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_47892ce013')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 1" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" onload="WH.performance.clearMarks('image1_rendered'); WH.performance.mark('image1_rendered');" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/9b/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-1-Version-2.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-1-Version-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript>
<script>WH.performance.clearMarks('image1_rendered'); WH.performance.mark('image1_rendered');</script></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Sift the dry ingredients together.</b> The dry ingredients are the flour, cocoa powder, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Place all the dry ingredients in a sifter and shake it back and forth over a bowl to eliminate the clumps.<span id="liquid"></span>
<script>WH.performance.mark('step1_rendered');</script>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-2-Version-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-2-Version-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 2" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/77/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-2-Version-2.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-2-Version-2.jpg" height="485" id="img_ba74edb326" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_ba74edb326')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 2" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/77/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-2-Version-2.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-2-Version-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 2" class="step_num">2</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_2"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Stir in the liquid ingredients and mix well.</b> These are the eggs, vegetable oil, sour cream, and vanilla extract. Some people like to add these ingredients individually, but others stir them together in a second bowl and before adding them to the dry ingredients.<span id="pan"></span>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-3-Version-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-3-Version-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 3" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/66/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-3-Version-2.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-3-Version-2.jpg" height="485" id="img_8d939da423" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_8d939da423')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 3" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/66/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-3-Version-2.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-3-Version-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 3" class="step_num">3</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_3"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Grease and flour an 8 inch round pan.</b> Slowly pour the cake batter in. Make sure to get every bit of the batter into the pan. <span id="bake"></span>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-4-Version-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-4-Version-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 4" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/d6/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-4-Version-2.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-4-Version-2.jpg" height="485" id="img_e86a8bd7d1" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_e86a8bd7d1')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 4" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/d6/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-4-Version-2.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-4-Version-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 4" class="step_num">4</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_4"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><b>Bake at 350 °F (177 °C) for 30 minutes</b>.</b><span id="cool"></span>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-5-Version-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-5-Version-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 5" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/62/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-5-Version-2.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-5-Version-2.jpg" height="485" id="img_3738774937" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_3738774937')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 5" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/62/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-5-Version-2.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-5-Version-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 5" class="step_num">5</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_5"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Let the cake cool for five minutes.</b>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-6-Version-3.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-6-Version-3.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 6" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/48/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-6-Version-3.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-6-Version-3.jpg" height="485" id="img_3028fe784e" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_3028fe784e')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 6" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/48/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-6-Version-3.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-6-Version-3.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 6" class="step_num">6</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_1_6"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Wait until the cake is completely cool.</b> Then you may frost or decorate as desired. Enjoy!

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
<div class="wh_ad_inner step_ad" data-adsenseheight="90" data-adsensewidth="728" data-adtargetid="methodad" data-adunitpath="" data-aps-timeout="2000" data-apsload="1" data-channels="6381149051,4805470868" data-lateload="0" data-loaded="0" data-service="dfp" data-slot="" data-viewablerefresh="1">

</div>
<div class="clearall adclear"></div>
<script>WH.desktopAds.addBodyAd('methodad')</script>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
<a name="qz_anchor_3"></a>
<div class="qz_container qz_desktop" id="qz_container_3">
<div class="qz_score">Score<br/><span class="qz_numerator">0</span> / <span class="qz_denominator">0</span>
</div>
<div class="qz_header">
<p>Method 1 Quiz</p>
<p class="qz_question">How should you add the liquid ingredients to the dry ingredients?</p>
</div>
<form action="#" class="qz_form" target="_blank">
<div class="qz_section incorrect" id="quiz_3_0">
<input class="qz_radio" id="radio_3_0" name="quiz_3" type="radio"/><label for="radio_3_0">Mix the liquid ingredients together first.</label>
<p class="qz_explanation">Almost! This is a good way to do it, but it is not the only way! More importantly, make sure you add the right amounts of each ingredients! <span class="qz_addon">There’s a better option out there!</span></p>
</div>
<div class="qz_section incorrect" id="quiz_3_1">
<input class="qz_radio" id="radio_3_1" name="quiz_3" type="radio"/><label for="radio_3_1">Add liquid ingredients one by one.</label>
<p class="qz_explanation">Close! You can do it this way, but it's okay to add liquid ingredients in a different way, too! Make sure that you've gotten rid of any clumps in the dry ingredients before you add the liquids, though! <span class="qz_addon">Try another answer...</span></p>
</div>
<div class="qz_section correct" id="quiz_3_2">
<input class="qz_radio" id="radio_3_2" name="quiz_3" type="radio"/><label for="radio_3_2">All of the above.</label>
<p class="qz_explanation">Right! Some people add the liquid ingredients individually while others mix the liquid ingredients together first before adding them to the dry ingredients. Either way, your cake should turn out beautiful and delicious! <span class="qz_addon">Read on for another quiz question.</span></p>
</div>
</form>

</div>
<div class="clearall adclear"></div>
<script>WH.desktopAds.addQuizAd('quizad0')</script>
</div>
</div>
<a class="anchor" name="Moist_.26_Fluffy_Chocolate_Cake_2_sub"></a><div class="section steps sticky">
<h3>
<div class="altblock"><label class="method_label">Method</label> <span>2</span>
</div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="Moist_.26_Fluffy_Chocolate_Cake_2">Moist & Fluffy Chocolate Cake</span>
</h3>
<div class="section_text" id="steps_2">
<ol class="steps_list_2">
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-7.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-7.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 7" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/d5/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-7.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-7.jpg" height="485" id="img_828892b2e6" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_828892b2e6')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 7" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/d5/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-7.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-7.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Prepare to make the cake.</b> Preheat the oven to 325° Fahrenheit or 162° Celsius. Grease and flour two 9-inch round baking pans.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-8-Version-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-8-Version-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 8" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/ec/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-8-Version-2.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-8-Version-2.jpg" height="485" id="img_cc72901719" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_cc72901719')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 8" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/ec/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-8-Version-2.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-8-Version-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 2" class="step_num">2</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_2"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Mix the dry ingredients.</b> In a large bowl, combine the flour, salt, baking powder, baking soda, cocoa powder, and sugar. Mix until the dry ingredients are properly folded in.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-9.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-9.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 9" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/3d/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-9.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-9.jpg" height="485" id="img_6c9f6aa10b" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_6c9f6aa10b')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 9" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/3d/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-9.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-9.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 3" class="step_num">3</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_3"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Add the coffee, oil, and buttermilk.</b> Pour in the hot coffee, canola oil, and buttermilk into the dry ingredients. Mix using a whisk or hand blender, until the ingredients resemble a light brown cake batter.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-10.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-10.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 10" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/2d/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-10.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-10.jpg" height="485" id="img_36c0962871" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_36c0962871')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 10" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/2d/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-10.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-10.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 4" class="step_num">4</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_4"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Add the eggs and vanilla.</b> Crack in the eggs and pour in the vanilla extract into the cake batter. Mix one last time until there are no more flour streaks and the chocolate cake batter is slightly thick.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-11.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-11.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 11" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/f4/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-11.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-11.jpg" height="485" id="img_c3379ef71b" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_c3379ef71b')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 11" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/f4/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-11.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-11.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 5" class="step_num">5</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_5"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Pour batter into the cake pans.</b> Using a rubber spatula, scrape the cake batter into both of the cake pans. Remove any leftover batter by scraping the edges of the bowl.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-12-Version-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-12-Version-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 12" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c2/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-12-Version-2.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-12-Version-2.jpg" height="485" id="img_c8ffbf10b0" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_c8ffbf10b0')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 12" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c2/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-12-Version-2.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-12-Version-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 6" class="step_num">6</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_6"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Bake the cake.</b> Place both cake pans in the oven to bake. Have the cake bake for about an hour, until the cake rises and is fluffy. Check to see if the cake is ready by sticking a small knife in the middle. If it comes out clean, it is fully baked.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-13.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-13.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 13" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/df/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-13.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-13.jpg" height="485" id="img_7281d74dd5" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_7281d74dd5')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 13" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/df/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-13.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-13.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 7" class="step_num">7</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_7"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Let the cake cool.</b> Remove both pans from the oven and have the cakes cool on a wire rack for about ten minutes. Leave them until they are cool enough to touch.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-14-Version-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-14-Version-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 14" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/cb/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-14-Version-2.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-14-Version-2.jpg" height="485" id="img_fe65f33871" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_fe65f33871')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 14" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/cb/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-14-Version-2.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-14-Version-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 8" class="step_num">8</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_8"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Frost and decorate.</b> Consider stacking both cakes to make a two-layer chocolate cake. Frost with <a href="/Make-Chocolate-Buttercream-Icing-(Frosting)" title="Make Chocolate Buttercream Icing (Frosting)">chocolate buttercream frosting</a> and/or decorate with any desired toppings such as berries, powdered sugar, coconut flakes, and sprinkles

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-15-Version-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-15-Version-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 15" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/47/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-15-Version-2.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-15-Version-2.jpg" height="485" id="img_b915217383" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_b915217383')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 15" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/47/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-15-Version-2.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-15-Version-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 9" class="step_num">9</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_9"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Serve and enjoy!</b> Slice the chocolate cake and serve on a serving plate. Enjoy!

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
<div id="tocad_wrap">

</div>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
</div>
<a class="anchor" name="Eggless_Chocolate_Cake_2_sub"></a><div class="section steps sticky">
<h3>
<div class="altblock"><label class="method_label">Method</label> <span>3</span>
</div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="Eggless_Chocolate_Cake_2">Eggless Chocolate Cake</span>
</h3>
<div class="section_text" id="steps_3">
<ol class="steps_list_2">
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-16.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-16.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 16" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/a4/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-16.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-16.jpg" height="485" id="img_3d723512c2" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_3d723512c2')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 16" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/a4/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-16.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-16.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Prepare to make the cake.</b> Preheat oven to 350° degrees Fahrenheit or 176° Celsius. Grease and flour a 9x13-inch cake pan.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-17.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-17.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 17" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/1b/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-17.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-17.jpg" height="485" id="img_e3a0a9b092" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_e3a0a9b092')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 17" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/1b/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-17.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-17.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 2" class="step_num">2</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_2"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Sift the dry ingredients except the sugar.</b> In a large bowl, sift the flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, and baking soda with a whisk. Mix until properly combined.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-18.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-18.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 18" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/3c/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-18.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-18.jpg" height="485" id="img_350d19949b" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_350d19949b')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 18" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/3c/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-18.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-18.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 3" class="step_num">3</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_3"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Add the sugar.</b> Carefully pour in the sugar into the dry ingredients. Mix again with the whisk until the sugar combines in with the dry ingredients.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-19.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-19.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 19" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/7a/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-19.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-19.jpg" height="485" id="img_d4730287ac" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_d4730287ac')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 19" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/7a/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-19.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-19.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 4" class="step_num">4</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_4"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Fold in the wet ingredients.</b> Pour in the vegetable oil, water, and vanilla extract into the dry ingredients. Stir with a whisk or a hand blender until the cake batter forms and there are no more flour streaks.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-20.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-20.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 20" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/f4/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-20.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-20.jpg" height="485" id="img_8cff900783" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_8cff900783')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 20" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/f4/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-20.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-20.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 5" class="step_num">5</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_5"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Pour the batter into the pan.</b> Using a rubber spatula, scrape the cake batter into both of the cake pans. Remove any leftover batter by scraping the edges of the bowl.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-21.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-21.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 21" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/61/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-21.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-21.jpg" height="485" id="img_2272773b24" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_2272773b24')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 21" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/61/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-21.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-21.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 6" class="step_num">6</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_6"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Bake the cake.</b> Place the cake pan in the oven to bake. Have the cake bake for about an hour, until the cake rises and is fluffy.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-22.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-22.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 22" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/11/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-22.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-22.jpg" height="485" id="img_dcb70ed14e" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_dcb70ed14e')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 22" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/11/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-22.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-22.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 7" class="step_num">7</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_7"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Let the cake cool.</b> Remove the pan from the oven and have the cake cool on a wire rack for about ten minutes. Leave the cake until it is cool enough to touch.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-23-Version-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-23-Version-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 23" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/eb/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-23-Version-2.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-23-Version-2.jpg" height="485" id="img_bff7a5c5c1" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_bff7a5c5c1')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 23" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/eb/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-23-Version-2.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-23-Version-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 8" class="step_num">8</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_8"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Frost and decorate.</b> Frost with chocolate <a href="/Make-Chocolate-Buttercream-Icing-(Frosting)" title="Make Chocolate Buttercream Icing (Frosting)">chocolate buttercream frosting</a> and/or decorate with any desired toppings such as berries, powdered sugar, coconut flakes, and sprinkles.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-24.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-24.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 24" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e2/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-24.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-24.jpg" height="485" id="img_ecc38cc5ad" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_ecc38cc5ad')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 24" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e2/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-24.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-24.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 9" class="step_num">9</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_9"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Serve and enjoy!</b> Slice the chocolate cake and serve on a serving plate. Enjoy!

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
<a name="qz_anchor_6"></a>
<div class="qz_container qz_desktop" id="qz_container_6">
<div class="qz_score">Score<br/><span class="qz_numerator">0</span> / <span class="qz_denominator">0</span>
</div>
<div class="qz_header">
<p>Method 3 Quiz</p>
<p class="qz_question">What is the biggest difference between a traditional chocolate cake and an eggless chocolate cake, other than the eggs?</p>
</div>
<form action="#" class="qz_form" target="_blank">
<div class="qz_section correct" id="quiz_6_0">
<input class="qz_radio" id="radio_6_0" name="quiz_6" type="radio"/><label for="radio_6_0">An eggless cake bakes longer.</label>
<p class="qz_explanation">Exactly! Eggless cakes take around an hour to bake, while basic chocolate cakes only take about thirty minutes. Pay attention to how your cake looks in the oven- when it has risen and is fluffy, it is ready to come out! <span class="qz_addon">Read on for another quiz question.</span></p>
</div>
<div class="qz_section incorrect" id="quiz_6_1">
<input class="qz_radio" id="radio_6_1" name="quiz_6" type="radio"/><label for="radio_6_1">A basic chocolate cake bakes longer.</label>
<p class="qz_explanation">Nope! Though the timing of both cakes is different, a basic chocolate cake doesn't take longer than an eggless one! Regardless of the type of chocolate cake you're making, pay close attention to your cake in the oven! <span class="qz_addon">There’s a better option out there!</span></p>
</div>
<div class="qz_section incorrect" id="quiz_6_2">
<input class="qz_radio" id="radio_6_2" name="quiz_6" type="radio"/><label for="radio_6_2">An eggless cake won't be fluffy.</label>
<p class="qz_explanation">Not quite! An eggless cake should still be fluffy, even without the eggs! Make sure you don't over-mix the cake batter as this can reduce the fluffiness of any cake. <span class="qz_addon">Click on another answer to find the right one...</span></p>
</div>
<div class="qz_section incorrect" id="quiz_6_3">
<input class="qz_radio" id="radio_6_3" name="quiz_6" type="radio"/><label for="radio_6_3">A basic chocolate cake doesn't need to cool before you frost it.</label>
<p class="qz_explanation">Definitely not! All cakes need to cool before you frost them. If you don't give them time to cool off, your frosting and decorations will melt right off! <span class="qz_addon">Guess again!</span></p>
</div>
</form>

<a class="anchor" name="Milkless_Chocolate_Cake_2_sub"></a><div class="section steps sticky">
<h3>
<div class="altblock"><label class="method_label">Method</label> <span>4</span>
</div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="Milkless_Chocolate_Cake_2">Milkless Chocolate Cake</span>
</h3>
<div class="section_text" id="steps_4">
<ol class="steps_list_2">
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-25.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-25.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 25" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/81/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-25.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-25.jpg" height="485" id="img_50dcad178d" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_50dcad178d')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 25" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/81/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-25.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-25.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_4_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Prepare to make the cake.</b> Preheat oven to 350° degrees Fahrenheit or 176° Celsius. Grease and flour two 9-inch cake pans.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-26.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-26.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 26" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c0/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-26.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-26.jpg" height="485" id="img_9d36abdffb" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_9d36abdffb')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 26" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c0/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-26.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-26.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 2" class="step_num">2</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_4_2"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Combine the dry ingredients.</b> In a large bowl, mix the flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, baking powder, and salt. Mix the ingredients with a whisk and then form a well in the middle of the bowl.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-27.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-27.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 27" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c1/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-27.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-27.jpg" height="485" id="img_eab90f9ca9" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_eab90f9ca9')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 27" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c1/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-27.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-27.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 3" class="step_num">3</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_4_3"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Add the wet ingredients.</b> Pour in the soy or almond milk, vinegar, eggs, brewed coffee, and dairy-free sour cream into the well. Use a blender to mix for about two minutes until the cake batter forms and there are no more flour streaks.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-28.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-28.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 28" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/fc/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-28.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-28.jpg" height="485" id="img_6cae1d1edc" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_6cae1d1edc')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 28" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/fc/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-28.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-28.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 4" class="step_num">4</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_4_4"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Pour batter into cake pans.</b> Using a rubber spatula, scrape the cake batter into both of the cake pans. Remove any leftover batter by scraping the edges of the bowl.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-29.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-29.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 29" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/be/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-29.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-29.jpg" height="485" id="img_a2bc4796da" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_a2bc4796da')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 29" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/be/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-29.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-29.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 5" class="step_num">5</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_4_5"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Bake the cake.</b> Place both cake pans in the oven to bake. Have the cake bake for about 30-40 minutes, until the cake rises and is fluffy.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-30.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-30.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 30" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/bf/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-30.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-30.jpg" height="485" id="img_69cce2a444" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_69cce2a444')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 30" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/bf/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-30.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-30.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 6" class="step_num">6</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_4_6"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Let the cake cool.</b> Remove both pans from the oven and have the cakes cool for about twenty minutes on a wire rack. Leave both cakes until they are cool enough to touch.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-31.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-31.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 31" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/b6/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-31.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-31.jpg" height="485" id="img_b613d1c45f" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_b613d1c45f')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 31" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/b6/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-31.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-31.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 7" class="step_num">7</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_4_7"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Frost and decorate.</b> Consider stacking both cakes to make a two-layer chocolate cake. Frost with <a href="/Make-Chocolate-Buttercream-Icing-(Frosting)" title="Make Chocolate Buttercream Icing (Frosting)">chocolate buttercream frosting</a> and/or decorate with any desired toppings such as berries, powdered sugar, coconut flakes, and sprinkles

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-32.jpg?ajax=true&aid=248948" href="#/Image:Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-32.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 32" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/fe/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-32.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-32.jpg" height="485" id="img_cb13c5da85" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_cb13c5da85')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Make a Chocolate Cake Step 32" class="whcdn content-fill" height="485" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/fe/Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-32.jpg/aid248948-v4-728px-Make-a-Chocolate-Cake-Step-32.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 8" class="step_num">8</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_4_8"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Serve and enjoy!</b> Slice the chocolate cake and serve on a serving plate. Enjoy!

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
<a name="qz_anchor_1"></a>
<div class="qz_container qz_desktop" id="qz_container_1">
<div class="qz_score">Score<br/><span class="qz_numerator">0</span> / <span class="qz_denominator">0</span>
</div>
<div class="qz_header">
<p>Method 4 Quiz</p>
<p class="qz_question">True or False: Milkless chocolate cake takes longer to mix than basic chocolate cake.</p>
</div>
<form action="#" class="qz_form" target="_blank">
<div class="qz_section incorrect" id="quiz_1_0">
<input class="qz_radio" id="radio_1_0" name="quiz_1" type="radio"/><label for="radio_1_0">True </label>
<p class="qz_explanation">Nope! The different liquid ingredients in milkless chocolate cake don't make it more difficult to mix! If you want to add a different splash of flavor to your milkless chocolate cake, consider usiing vanilla-flavored soy or almond milk! <span class="qz_addon">Pick another answer!</span></p>
</div>
<div class="qz_section correct" id="quiz_1_1">
<input class="qz_radio" id="radio_1_1" name="quiz_1" type="radio"/><label for="radio_1_1">False </label>
<p class="qz_explanation">Yes! Although the liquid ingredients in a milkless chocolate cake are slightly different, both cakes should take a similar amount of time to mix. Consider using a hand mixer if you plan to bake a lot and don't want to take the time and effort to hand-mix! <span class="qz_addon">Read on for another quiz question.</span></p>
</div>
</form>
<div class="wh_ad_inner hidden" data-adtargetid="quizad2" data-adunitpath="" data-aps-timeout="2000" data-apsload="1" data-channels="6381149051,4805470868" data-lateload="0" data-loaded="0" data-service="dfp" data-slot="" data-viewablerefresh="1">
<div class="ad_label ad_label_dollar" id="quizad2"></div>
<script>googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('quizad2'); });</script>
</div>
